resources.string:
ABOUT RELAUNCH
ReLaunch is a versatile launcher application for the Nook Simple Touch (Sony PRS-T1 is also supported). It provides a complete replacement of the Home screen functionality, and can be used with any number and combination of book-reading applications.
ReLaunch allows extensive customization of the user interface, which gives you quick access to the features and third-party applications you use most. For best experience, your library should be organized into folders, and book files should have meaningful names that match their titles.
For certain features to become available, ReLaunch must be run in launcher mode. Some other features require superuser access to work, or they might only be implemented for the Nook Simple Touch (a notice will be displayed where applicable).
